com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology

Interface IPhysicalTopologyMonitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDistributedApplicationRegistry, IPhysicalTopology
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ITopologyMonitor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPhysicalTopologyMonitor, AbstractStarTopologyMonitor, BcastTopologyMonitor, CentralizedTopologyMonitor, GaianNeighborOnlyTopologyMonitor, InternalPhysicalTopoMonitor, McastTopologyMonitor, PhysicalTopologyMonitorProxy, StarTopologyMonitor, TopologyMonitor

    public interface IPhysicalTopologyMonitor
extends IPhysicalTopology
    Provides the ability to receive notifications when topology has changed.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPeerListener(IApplicationDescriptor app, IPhysicalTopologyListener l)
      Add a listener to receive notifications of new or removed application peers.
      int getMonitoringInterval()
      Get max time between calls to the listeners, in milliseconds.
      boolean removePeerListener(IApplicationDescriptor app, IPhysicalTopologyListener l)
      Remove a previously installed listener for peers of the given application.
      void setMonitoringInterval(int msec)
      Not typically used, except for testing to shorten the timeout times.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.IPhysicalTopology

        getNeighborPeers, getNextHop, getReachablePeers, getReachablePeers

      • Methods inherited from interface com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.topology.IDistributedApplicationRegistry

        clear, deregister, getRegistrations, isStarted, lookup, register, start, stop

    • Method Detail

      • getMonitoringInterval

        int getMonitoringInterval()
        Get max time between calls to the listeners, in milliseconds.
        Returns:
        0 if there is not periodically defined time.

      • setMonitoringInterval

        void setMonitoringInterval(int msec)
        Not typically used, except for testing to shorten the timeout times.
        Parameters:
        msec -

      • addPeerListener

        boolean addPeerListener(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                      IPhysicalTopologyListener l)
        Add a listener to receive notifications of new or removed application peers. Notifications concerning the addition/removal of the given app must not be sent.
        Parameters:
        l -

      • removePeerListener

        boolean removePeerListener(IApplicationDescriptor app,
                         IPhysicalTopologyListener l)
        Remove a previously installed listener for peers of the given application.
        Parameters:
        app -
        l -
